title.narrative: Irrigation: On-farm Irrigation Development Project in Oldlands

description.narrative: The objective of the project is to improve the livelihoods of the target group through: (i) higher on-farm water use efficiency; (ii) improvements in agricultural productivity; (iii) marketing support for smallholders and the landless; and (iv) promoting employment and income generation by supporting small businesses and microenterprises (SBMs).The project will contribute to the capacity building of: (i) community-based organizations such as WUOs, community development associations (CDAs) and marketing associations (MAs); and (ii) public service providers, such as extension, research and irrigation services, and the SFD. Capacity building will take the form of training, technical assistance and knowledge sharing.

name.narrative: Irrigation: On-farm Irrigation Development Project in Oldlands

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
